metadata.name: Adwind RAT / JRAT File Artifact
metadata.comment: Detects javaw.exe in AppData folder as used by Adwind / JRAT

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\appdata\\roaming\\oracle\\bin\\java')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('.exe')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\retrive')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('.vbs')))

output.summary: Detects javaw.exe in AppData folder as used by Adwind / JRAT
